name: .MSH File Extension
summary: Learn about .MSH files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Proprietary 3D model mesh format used by Orbiter, a free space flight simulation program; saves the three-dimensional structure of a shuttle, station, or another space object; uses ASCII text formatting and specifies vertices and mesh groups for different parts of the model, as well as the textures (.DDS files) and materials to apply to the model.

content: MSH files are saved in the \​Meshes\​ folder of the software installation.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
